Adolescence:  10 - 19 years
Adolescence is the age between 10 to 19 years. This is the 
time when changes occur in both girls and boys. Body changes 
occur due to increase in hormone (secretions of certain glands) 
levels in the blood, which results in body development, sexual development and emotional changes. 
Adolescence in girls:
✱ One of the first signs is that the breasts slowly develop from a 
small nodule to their full form.
✱ Menstruation (monthly bleeding) starts during this phase.  At 
first it may be small amounts and at irregular intervals. It gradually 
increases in amount; the bleeding may last for 2-5 days and comes regularly once a month. Once menstruation begins, the girl can become pregnant if she has sexual intercourse.
